message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $15,000 is already a competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet the price of $12,500. I would like to propose $11,000 as my maximum offer for the product.
